SELECT t.hospital_id, t.province, t.city, t.lng, t.lat, t1.hospital_name, t1.hospital_level, t1.dept_name, t2.doctor_name, t2.doctor_intro, t2.field, t2.positional,
(SELECT count(1) FROM hospital_guahao_log t3 WHERE t.hospital_id=t3.hospital_id) appointment_num
(SELECT count(1) FROM hospital_guahao_log t3 WHERE t2.doctor_code = t3.doctor_code) appointment_num
FROM hospital_address t LEFT JOIN hospital_dept t1 ON t.hospital_id = t1.hospital_id LEFT JOIN hospital_register_doctor t2 ON t1.dept_id = t2.dept_id
group by hospital_id
order by
${paramMap.orderCol}
hospital_id desc
